title: For Practice
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Setsuna-san, I did an improvised play practice with Yoshiko-san the other day<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Waah, a play by just the two of you huh. Please let me watch next time♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You’re welcome to watch, but…. Actually, it’s quite hard to do everything improvised….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>So you’re saying it’s better to have a script?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yeah. It’s fun to do improvised plays, but I still enjoy going through each line of a script….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>….Then, I have an idea, Shizuku-san! We can make our own script!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eeh!? I hadn’t thought of that…. But that may be a good idea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>A conflict between an angel and a fallen angel…. There’s no theme more moving than that. That’s right, shall we get Hanamaru-san’s, Riko-san’s, and Umi-san’s help? I think it will be interesting to bring in perspective from people who like books!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>That seems like it will be an amazing script…. Setsuna-san, let’s contact them immediately!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
